00001 /* fusion-priority.cpp: ``Multi-Hybrid'' priority selection table [Evers et al., ISCA 1996] */
00002 /*
00003  * __COPYRIGHT__ GT
00004  */
00005 
00006 #define COMPONENT_NAME "priority"
00007 
00008 #ifdef BPRED_PARSE_ARGS
00009 if(!strcasecmp("priority",type))
00010 {
00011   int num_entries;
00012 
00013   if(sscanf(opt_string,"%*[^:]:%[^:]:%d",name,&num_entries) != 2)
00014     fatal("bad fusion options string %s (should be \"priority:name:num_entries\")",opt_string);
00015   return new fusion_priority_t(name,num_pred,num_entries);
00016 }
00017 #else
00018 
00019 class fusion_priority_t:public fusion_t
00020 {
00021   protected:
00022 
00023   int meta_size;
00024   int meta_mask;
00025   my2bc_t ** meta;
00026 
00027   public:
00028 
00029   /* CREATE */
00030   fusion_priority_t(char * const arg_name,
00031                     const int arg_num_pred,
00032                     const int arg_meta_size
00033                    )
00034   {
00035     init();
00036 
00037     /* verify arguments are valid */
00038     CHECK_PPOW2(arg_meta_size);
00039 
00040     name = strdup(arg_name);
00041     if(!name)
00042       fatal("couldn't malloc fusion priority name (strdup)");
00043     type = strdup("priority Multi-Hybrid");
00044     if(!type)
00045       fatal("couldn't malloc fusion priority type (strdup)");
00046 
00047 
00048     num_pred = arg_num_pred;
00049     meta_size = arg_meta_size;
00050     meta_mask = arg_meta_size-1;
00051     meta = (my2bc_t**) calloc(arg_meta_size,sizeof(my2bc_t*));
00052     if(!meta)
00053       fatal("couldn't malloc priority meta-table");
00054     for(int i=0;i<meta_size;i++)
00055     {
00056       meta[i] = (my2bc_t*) calloc(num_pred,sizeof(my2bc_t));
00057       if(!meta[i])
00058         fatal("couldn't malloc priority meta-table[%d]",i);
00059       for(int j=0;j<num_pred;j++)
00060         meta[i][j] = 3; /* all counters initialized to 3 */
00061     }
00062 
00063     bits = meta_size*num_pred*2;
00064   }
00065 
00066   /* DESTROY */
00067   ~fusion_priority_t()
00068   {
00069     for(int i=0;i<meta_size;i++)
00070     {
00071       free(meta[i]); meta[i] = NULL;
00072     }
00073     free(meta); meta = NULL;
00074   }
00075 
00076   /* LOOKUP */
00077   /* we don't do any unrolled version of the lookup function;
00078      I haven't thought of any reasonable implementation that
00079      isn't basically the same as the generic version. -GL */
00080   FUSION_LOOKUP_HEADER
00081   {
00082     int index = PC&meta_mask;
00083     my2bc_t * meta_counters = meta[index];
00084     bool pred;
00085     int i;
00086 
00087     /* because all meta_counters are initialized to 3, and the update
00088        rules ensure that there will always be a three, this loop will
00089        always terminate through the break. */
00090     for(i=0;i<num_pred;i++)
00091     {
00092       if(meta_counters[i]==MY2BC_STRONG_TAKEN)
00093         break;
00094     }
00095 
00096     pred = preds[i];
00097 
00098     BPRED_STAT(lookups++;)
00099     scvp->updated = false;
00100 
00101     return pred;
00102   }
00103 
00104   /* UPDATE */
00105 
00106   FUSION_UPDATE_HEADER
00107   {
00108     int i;
00109     int a_3_was_correct = false;
00110     int index = PC&meta_mask;
00111     my2bc_t * meta_counters = meta[index];
00112 
00113     if(!scvp->updated)
00114     {
00115         BPRED_STAT(updates++;)
00116         BPRED_STAT(num_hits += our_pred == outcome;)
00117         scvp->updated = true;
00118     }
00119 
00120     /* update rule depends on whether one of the meta-counters with a
00121        value of 3 predicted correctly ("a 3 was correct"). */
00122     for(i=0;i<num_pred;i++)
00123       if(meta_counters[i]==MY2BC_STRONG_TAKEN && preds[i]==outcome)
00124       {
00125         a_3_was_correct = true;
00126         break;
00127       }
00128 
00129     /* if one of the components that had a meta-counter value of 3
00130        was correct, decrement the meta-counters of all components
00131        that mispredicted. */
00132     if(a_3_was_correct)
00133       for(i=0;i<num_pred;i++)
00134       {
00135         MY2BC_COND_DEC(meta_counters[i],(preds[i]!=outcome));
00136       }
00137     else /* otherwise increment those who were correct */
00138       for(i=0;i<num_pred;i++)
00139       {
00140         MY2BC_COND_INC(meta_counters[i],(preds[i]==outcome));
00141       }
00142   }
00143 
00144 };
00145 
00146 #endif /* BPRED_PARSE_ARGS */
00147 #undef COMPONENT_NAME
